famousPersonalities.title: Famous Personalities
famousPersonalities.subtitle: My portfolio includes projects with renowned actors and public figures from Kazakhstan
famousPersonalities.description: Creating content with famous personalities requires a special approach — from concept development to final presentation. Each project is unique and aimed at revealing personality through cinematic language.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Director and producer with 4 years of experience creating cinematic content
about.name: Alibi Alisher
about.intro1: I have been involved in video production for over 4 years, with the last 2 years in the role of director, producer, and brand content producer.
about.intro2: My specialty is creating cinematic video content: from concept development and scriptwriting to organizing the filming process and analyzing the finished product. I help brands and personalities get not only quality visual packaging, but also measurable results in terms of reach, subscribers, and increased recognition.

contact.title: Contacts
contact.subtitle: Ready to collaborate with brands and companies that need quality visual content and tangible results.
contact.form-description: Fill out the form below so I can get in touch with you.

achievements.sebebin: Sebebin Aitayin FM — over 5 million reach
achievements.comprehensive: Comprehensive approach: from idea to result

hajj.title: Hajj promotional video in Saudi Arabia
hajj.description: Creating a cinematic promotional video for spiritual travel to holy places in Saudi Arabia. Filming was conducted in several cities, including Mecca and Medina.
hajj.results: Over 2 million views in the first week

restaurant.title: Restaurant promotion in Medina
restaurant.description: Concept development and creation of a series of promotional videos for a restaurant in Medina. The project included filming the interior, dishes and atmosphere of the establishment.

actors.title: Reel series with iconic actors
actors.description: Creating a series of cinematic reels featuring famous Kazakh actors: Ayan Ötepbergen, Asylkhan Tölepov, Rustem Zhanyamanov and others.
actors.results: Total reach of over 8 million views

tary.title: Collaboration with Tary Coffee
tary.description: Promoting the coffee shop chain through creating atmospheric videos showcasing coffee quality and the cozy atmosphere of the establishments.

tumi.title: Tumi commercial
tumi.description: Creating a premium commercial for Tumi in Saudi Arabia, emphasizing the quality and prestige of the brand.

myrza.title: Myrza Brand
myrza.description: Comprehensive work on visual content for a fashion brand, including concept creation, filming and post-production.
